name: Verify email addresses in Airtable by MailerCheck
description:
This template periodically checks for new records in Airtable and uses the retrieved information to validate emails in MailerCheck and update Airtable record with a corresponding status. 

The template expects your Airtable table to have these columns:
1) Email
2) Status
3) Created Time

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
